Title: SW Defined Network
Abstract:
Basic Functionality
-SDN Service Chaining
Benefits to Customer
-Better usage of VAS, Value Added Services using dynamic chaining
-SDN providing dynamic network connectivity for EPC services in cloud

Title: VoLTE/SRVCC
Speakers: Karen Zhen& Xiao Li & Eva Li

Title: Ericsson LTE Broadcasting
Abstract: Ericsson LTE Broadcast enables new revenue models for premium media content offering exceptional user experience while efficiently utilizing available LTE spectrum and operators?? network resources??

Title: LTE/Wifi integration by Real Time traffic steering
Multi Screen TV Portal
Abstract:
Basic Functionality
-Easy access to content
-A unified television environment
-One stop shop
-A complete ecosystem
-A streamlined consumer experience
Benefits to Customer
-One Solution: Any content, any network, any device, value-added services
-Enhance the viewing experience through the 2nd screen without disturbing the main TV experience
-Drive operator revenue and improved user experience through mobile broadband: -Optimize video delivery over LTE
If any special needs to implement/deploy the function
-This is a lightweight and standalone demo version of a complete End 2 End solution

Title: Info on demand & eye ball tracking
Abstract:
Basic Functionality
-Enables consumers to obtain additional information about the visual elements presented on the screen via a rich set of meta-data presented in a user-friendly way. -Enable consumers to share and discover similar visual elements in other content, or to purchase merchandising products related to those visual elements.
Benefits to Customer
-Encourage media consumption thru discovery and sharing of similar content.
-Additional revenue channels in terms of content discovery, advertisement and cross selling of goods and content.
-Increasing advertising values by providing hard data on consumer??s interested visual elements
-Increase advertising values by pin-point of consumer attention (eye-tracker extension required)
If any special needs to implement/deploy the function
-About 2m distance from the eye-tracker for optimal operation of eye-tracker extension.

Title: HD video conference across multi-terminals via MBB(LTE/HSPA)
WiFi indoor Positioning
Abstract:
Basic Functionality
-Provide WiFi based indoor positioning functionality. Client side (end-user) can request own location information in indoor environment on-demand, while server side (operator) can record these location information. 
Benefits to Customer
-Service enabler of LBS solution in indoor environment, complementary to the outdoor positioning system.
-Providing value added service to end-user, and other vertical chain (e.g. Mall, Airport, Office) based on the location data.
If any special needs to implement/deploy the function
-WiFi Access Point Information. (Optimized WiFi APs deployment for positioning)
-Collect and maintain the WiFi fingerprinting data in the target area to enhance accuracy.

Title: Signalling Optimization in EPC
Abstract:
Basic Functionality
-Service based Paging
-UE Signaling Control of misbehaving terminals 
Benefits to Customer
-Save up to 85% paging messages, capacity which can be used for other purposes.
-Distinguish and handle ??bad signaling?? and prioritize ??good?? signaling.
-How much network load protection that can be provided by EPC, including EPC itself and also eNB
If any special needs to implement/deploy the function
-Existing functionality in the SGSN-MME

Title: Geo Redundancy in MME pool
Abstract:
Basic Functionality
-Is the functionality where UE information is replicated and ??stored else where?? in a pool environment
-Allows an outage of one or many MMEs without major service impact on end users. 
Benefits to Customer
-Virtually no service impact on end users in outage scenarios and assures extremely high availability of service to business partners.
-Secures operational income and avoids negative market perception.
 -Use of sub-RANs saves transmission costs, since an eNodeB can select a nearby located MME. 
If any special needs to implement/deploy the function
-SGW shall support NTSR(Network Triggered Service Restoration) or keep bearer resource for a period of time when connected MME is not available
-PGW shall keep bearer resource for a period of time when connected SGW is not available
